articles.description: Players from Melbourne-based AFL clubs living in COVID-19 hotspots need to urgently find alternate accommodation to ensure they are not barred from entering New South Wales.
articles.content:
AFL players living in Melbourne's coronavirus hotspots will need to urgently relocate to other suburbs if they want to play matches in Sydney.
